numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that clean methods of energy generation consistently yield more energy production than fossil fuels yield for all fuel types.
2. I wonder why China has a much steeper graph for energy production than the United States has.
4. My community can continue to develop clean energy-generation techniques.
5. These techniques can produce more and more energy.
6. These techniques can become more and more efficient.
7. The headline is: Fossil Fuels; A Thing Of The Past.
